text:
Qardio | Senior DevOps | San Francisco | Onsite | Full-time | https://www.getqardio.com

Qardio is hiring to give the world easier, smarter, better hearth health through technology. We have an integrated hardware/app/cloud/services platform for health care monitoring, with a focus on cardiology.

We are looking for a Senior DevOps engineer to join our team in San Francisco

Check out the role and apply here: https://careers.getqardio.com/apply/RyUQNtgA51

Not a DevOps engineer? We are hiring across the board! Visit https://www.getqardio.com/careers/
